Name: KANAPOCALYPSE
About the game: Do you love Japanese alphabet , Zombies and Rock 'n' roll ? Then this is a game for you! OVERVIEW KANAPOCALYPSE is an educative RPG guesser game. Train your Hiragana and Katakana while raiding a city during the apocalypse. Earn money, buy new weapons and keep study/learn more Japanese alphabet. KEY FEATURES 3 GAME MODES : Choose between Hiragana, Katakana or PRO ( including both Kana ) 2 ALPHABETS : Hiragana and Katakana also includes Digraphs and Diacritics 10 DIFFICULTY LEVELS : Each difficulty levels increase kana's number, number of zombies and their hitpoints LEARNING PROGRESSION : Starts learning on low difficulty and progress until you can finally beat the PRO mode 30 WEAPONS : Raiding missions gives you money to buy weapons ( melee and ranged weapons ) CRITICALS : Choose your weapons wisely to improve your critical chances in-game 7 AREAS : Explore 7 different parts of the city FIND YOUR MISSING BEAR : On each missions, you can find your missing bear. Find it and collect a better reward STATS : All your stats ( kills, good answers, etc.. ) are available from the main menu LOCAL SAVES : Your progression is save locally on your computer. Use the Reset button in the settings to start a fresh game HAPPY KANAPOCALYPSE RAIDS !
